14 template <typename VoxelType>
15 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getDistance(const Point& pos,
16  FloatingPoint* distance,
17  bool interpolate) const {
18  if (interpolate) {
19  return getInterpDistance(pos, distance);
20  } else {
21  return getNearestDistance(pos, distance);
22  }
23 }

25 template <typename VoxelType>
26 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getVoxel(const Point& pos, VoxelType* voxel,
27  bool interpolate) const {
28  if (interpolate) {
29  return getInterpVoxel(pos, voxel);
30  } else {
31  return getNearestVoxel(pos, voxel);
32  }
33 }
34 
35 template <typename VoxelType>
36 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getGradient(const Point& pos, Point* grad,
37  const bool interpolate) const {
38  CHECK_NOTNULL(grad);
39 
40  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockType::ConstPtr block_ptr =
41  layer_->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(pos);
42  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
43  return false;
44  }
45  // Now get the gradient.
46  *grad = Point::Zero();
47  // Iterate over all 3 D, and over negative and positive signs in central
48  // difference.
49  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < 3u; ++i) {
50  for (int sign = -1; sign <= 1; sign += 2) {
51  Point offset = Point::Zero();
52  offset(i) = sign * block_ptr->voxel_size();
53  FloatingPoint offset_distance;
54  if (!getDistance(pos + offset, &offset_distance, interpolate)) {
55  return false;
56  }
57  (*grad)(i) += offset_distance * static_cast<FloatingPoint>(sign);
58  }
59  }
60  // Scale by correct size.
61  // This is central difference, so it's 2x voxel size between measurements.
62  *grad /= (2 * block_ptr->voxel_size());
63  return true;
64 }
65 
66 template <typename VoxelType>
67 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getAdaptiveDistanceAndGradient(
68  const Point& pos, FloatingPoint* distance, Point* grad) const {
69  // TODO(helenol): try to see how to minimize number of lookups for the
70  // gradient and interpolation calculations...
71 
72  // Get the nearest neighbor distance first, we need this for the gradient
73  // calculations anyway.
74  FloatingPoint nearest_neighbor_distance = 0.0f;
75  bool interpolate = false;
76  if (!getDistance(pos, &nearest_neighbor_distance, interpolate)) {
77  // Then there is no data here at all.
78  return false;
79  }
80 
81  // Then try to get the interpolated distance.
82  interpolate = true;
83  bool has_interpolated_distance = getDistance(pos, distance, interpolate);
84 
85  // Now try to estimate the gradient. Same general procedure as getGradient()
86  // above, but also allow finite difference methods other than central
87  // difference (left difference, right difference).
88  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockType::ConstPtr block_ptr =
89  layer_->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(pos);
90  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
91  return false;
92  }
93 
94  Point gradient = Point::Zero();
95 
96  // Try to get the full gradient if possible.
97  bool has_interpolated_gradient = false;
98  if (has_interpolated_distance) {
99  has_interpolated_gradient = getGradient(pos, &gradient, interpolate);
100  }
101 
102  if (!has_interpolated_gradient) {
103  // Otherwise fall back to this...
104  interpolate = false;
105  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < 3u; ++i) {
106  // First check if we can get both sides for central difference.
107  Point offset = Point::Zero();
108  offset(i) = block_ptr->voxel_size();
109  FloatingPoint left_distance = 0.0f, right_distance = 0.0f;
110  bool left_valid = getDistance(pos - offset, &left_distance, interpolate);
111  bool right_valid =
112  getDistance(pos + offset, &right_distance, interpolate);
113 
114  if (left_valid && right_valid) {
115  gradient(i) =
116  (right_distance - left_distance) / (2.0f * block_ptr->voxel_size());
117  } else if (left_valid) {
118  gradient(i) = (nearest_neighbor_distance - left_distance) /
119  block_ptr->voxel_size();
120  } else if (right_valid) {
121  gradient(i) = (right_distance - nearest_neighbor_distance) /
122  block_ptr->voxel_size();
123  } else {
124  // This has no neighbors on any side in this dimension :(
125  return false;
126  }
127  }
128  }
129 
130  // If we weren't able to get the original interpolated distance value, then
131  // use the computed gradient to estimate what the value should be.
132  if (!has_interpolated_distance) {
133  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
134  block_ptr->computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(pos);
135  Point voxel_pos = block_ptr->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
136 
137  Point voxel_offset = pos - voxel_pos;
138  *distance = nearest_neighbor_distance + voxel_offset.dot(gradient);
139  }
140 
141  *grad = gradient;
142  return true;
143 }
144 
145 template <typename VoxelType>
146 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::setIndexes(const Point& pos,
147  BlockIndex* block_index,
148  InterpIndexes* voxel_indexes) const {
149  // get voxel index
150  *block_index = layer_->computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(pos);
151  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockType::ConstPtr block_ptr =
152  layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(*block_index);
153  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
154  return false;
155  }
156  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
157  block_ptr->computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(pos);
158 
159  // shift index to bottom left corner voxel (makes math easier)
160  Point center_offset =
161  pos - block_ptr->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
162  for (size_t i = 0; i < static_cast<size_t>(center_offset.rows()); ++i) {
163  // ensure that the point we are interpolating to is always larger than the
164  // center of the voxel_index in all dimensions
165  if (center_offset(i) < 0) {
166  voxel_index(i)--;
167  // move blocks if needed
168  if (voxel_index(i) < 0) {
169  (*block_index)(i)--;
170  voxel_index(i) += block_ptr->voxels_per_side();
171  }
172  }
173  }
174 
175  // get indexes of neighbors
176 
177  // FROM PAPER (http://spie.org/samples/PM159.pdf)
178  // clang-format off
179  (*voxel_indexes) <<
180  0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 1,
181  0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1,
182  0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1;
183  // clang-format on
184 
185  voxel_indexes->colwise() += voxel_index.array();
186  return true;
187 }
188 
189 template <typename VoxelType>
190 void Interpolator<VoxelType>::getQVector(const Point& voxel_pos,
191  const Point& pos,
192  const FloatingPoint voxel_size_inv,
193  InterpVector* q_vector) const {
194  CHECK_NOTNULL(q_vector);
195 
196  const Point voxel_offset = (pos - voxel_pos) * voxel_size_inv;
197 
198  CHECK((voxel_offset.array() >= 0).all()); // NOLINT
199 
200  // FROM PAPER (http://spie.org/samples/PM159.pdf)
201  // clang-format off
202  *q_vector <<
203  1,
204  voxel_offset[0],
205  voxel_offset[1],
206  voxel_offset[2],
207  voxel_offset[0] * voxel_offset[1],
208  voxel_offset[1] * voxel_offset[2],
209  voxel_offset[2] * voxel_offset[0],
210  voxel_offset[0] * voxel_offset[1] * voxel_offset[2];
211  // clang-format on
212 }
213 
214 template <typename VoxelType>
215 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getVoxelsAndQVector(
216  const BlockIndex& block_index, const InterpIndexes& voxel_indexes,
217  const Point& pos, const VoxelType** voxels, InterpVector* q_vector) const {
218  CHECK_NOTNULL(q_vector);
219 
220  // for each voxel index
221  for (size_t i = 0; i < static_cast<size_t>(voxel_indexes.cols()); ++i) {
222  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockType::ConstPtr block_ptr =
223  layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(block_index);
224  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
225  return false;
226  }
227 
228  VoxelIndex voxel_index = voxel_indexes.col(i);
229  // if voxel index is too large get neighboring block and update index
230  if ((voxel_index.array() >= block_ptr->voxels_per_side()).any()) {
231  BlockIndex new_block_index = block_index;
232  for (size_t j = 0; j < static_cast<size_t>(block_index.rows()); ++j) {
233  if (voxel_index(j) >=
234  static_cast<IndexElement>(block_ptr->voxels_per_side())) {
235  new_block_index(j)++;
236  voxel_index(j) -= block_ptr->voxels_per_side();
237  }
238  }
239  block_ptr = layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(new_block_index);
240  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
241  return false;
242  }
243  }
244  // use bottom left corner voxel to compute weights vector
245  if (i == 0) {
246  getQVector(block_ptr->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index), pos,
247  block_ptr->voxel_size_inv(), q_vector);
248  }
249 
250  const VoxelType& voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
251 
252  voxels[i] = &voxel;
253  if (!utils::isObservedVoxel(voxel)) {
254  return false;
255  }
256  }
257  return true;
258 }
259 
260 template <typename VoxelType>
261 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getVoxelsAndQVector(
262  const Point& pos, const VoxelType** voxels, InterpVector* q_vector) const {
263  // get block and voxels indexes (some voxels may have negative indexes)
264  BlockIndex block_index;
265  InterpIndexes voxel_indexes;
266  if (!setIndexes(pos, &block_index, &voxel_indexes)) {
267  return false;
268  }
269 
270  // get distances of 8 surrounding voxels and weights vector
271  return getVoxelsAndQVector(block_index, voxel_indexes, pos, voxels, q_vector);
272 }
273 
274 template <typename VoxelType>
275 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getInterpDistance(const Point& pos,
276  FloatingPoint* distance) const {
277  CHECK_NOTNULL(distance);
278 
279  // get distances of 8 surrounding voxels and weights vector
280  const VoxelType* voxels[8];
281  InterpVector q_vector;
282  if (!getVoxelsAndQVector(pos, voxels, &q_vector)) {
283  return false;
284  } else {
285  *distance = interpMember(q_vector, voxels, &getVoxelSdf);
286  return true;
287  }
288 }
289 
290 template <typename VoxelType>
291 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getNearestDistance(
292  const Point& pos, FloatingPoint* distance) const {
293  CHECK_NOTNULL(distance);
294 
295  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockType::ConstPtr block_ptr =
296  layer_->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(pos);
297  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
298  return false;
299  }
300 
301  const VoxelType& voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByCoordinates(pos);
302 
303  *distance = getVoxelSdf(voxel);
304 
305  return utils::isObservedVoxel(voxel);
306 }
307 
308 template <typename VoxelType>
309 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getInterpVoxel(const Point& pos,
310  VoxelType* voxel) const {
311  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
312 
313  // get voxels of 8 surrounding voxels and weights vector
314  const VoxelType* voxels[8];
315  InterpVector q_vector;
316  if (!getVoxelsAndQVector(pos, voxels, &q_vector)) {
317  return false;
318  } else {
319  *voxel = interpVoxel(q_vector, voxels);
320  return true;
321  }
322 }
323 
324 template <typename VoxelType>
325 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getNearestVoxel(const Point& pos,
326  VoxelType* voxel) const {
327  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
328 
329  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockType::ConstPtr block_ptr =
330  layer_->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(pos);
331  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
332  return false;
333  }
334 
335  *voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByCoordinates(pos);
336 
337  return utils::isObservedVoxel(*voxel);
338 }
339 
340 template <typename VoxelType>
341 bool Interpolator<VoxelType>::getNearestDistanceAndWeight(
342  const Point& pos, FloatingPoint* distance, float* weight) const {
343  CHECK_NOTNULL(distance);
344  CHECK_NOTNULL(weight);
345 
346  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockType::ConstPtr block_ptr =
347  layer_->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(pos);
348  if (block_ptr == nullptr) {
349  return false;
350  }
351  const VoxelType& voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByCoordinates(pos);
352  *distance = getVoxelSdf(voxel);
353  *weight = getVoxelWeight(voxel);
354  return true;
355 }

372 template <>
373 inline float Interpolator<EsdfVoxel>::getVoxelWeight(const EsdfVoxel& voxel) {
374  return voxel.observed ? 1.0f : 0.0f;

397 template <typename VoxelType>
398 template <typename TGetter>
399 inline FloatingPoint Interpolator<VoxelType>::interpMember(
400  const InterpVector& q_vector, const VoxelType** voxels,
401  TGetter (*getter)(const VoxelType&)) {
402  InterpVector data;
403  for (int i = 0; i < data.size(); ++i) {
404  data[i] = static_cast<FloatingPoint>((*getter)(*voxels[i]));
405  }
406 
407  // FROM PAPER (http://spie.org/samples/PM159.pdf)
408  // clang-format off
409  static const InterpTable interp_table =
410  (InterpTable() <<
411  1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
412  -1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0,
413  -1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
414  -1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
415  1, 0, -1, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0,
416  1, -1, -1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0,
417  1, -1, 0, 0, -1, 1, 0, 0,
418  -1, 1, 1, -1, 1, -1, -1, 1
419  )
420  .finished();
421  // clang-format on
422  return q_vector * (interp_table * data.transpose());
423 }
424 
425 template <>
426 inline TsdfVoxel Interpolator<TsdfVoxel>::interpVoxel(
427  const InterpVector& q_vector, const TsdfVoxel** voxels) {
428  TsdfVoxel voxel;
429  voxel.distance = interpMember(q_vector, voxels, &getVoxelSdf);
430  voxel.weight = interpMember(q_vector, voxels, &getVoxelWeight);
431 
432  voxel.color.r = interpMember(q_vector, voxels, &getRed);
433  voxel.color.g = interpMember(q_vector, voxels, &getGreen);
434  voxel.color.b = interpMember(q_vector, voxels, &getBlue);
435  voxel.color.a = interpMember(q_vector, voxels, &getAlpha);
436 
437  return voxel;
438 }
